Sentencas: The feasibility of conversion of propane to propylene in a fuel cell using yttrium-doped barium cerate as the proton-conducting electrolyte and platinum as anode and cathode catalysts was investigated.
Titulo: Conversion of propane to propylene in a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The distribution of gas products from anode outlet was analyzed by gas chromatography and, discussed under open circuit conditions and when discharging the fuel cell.
Titulo: Conversion of propane to propylene in a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Under open circuit conditions, because there were only chemically catalytic reactions and thermal reactions in the anode chamber, the gas slate was little selective to propylene.
Titulo: Conversion of propane to propylene in a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, the propylene selectivity was obviously enhanced when discharging the fuel cell, through activating the electro-catalytic dehydrogenation of propane.
Titulo: Conversion of propane to propylene in a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The propylene yield obtained from the electro-catalytic reaction reached 70-80%.
Titulo: Conversion of propane to propylene in a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, relatively good fuel cell performances were achieved.
Titulo: Conversion of propane to propylene in a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The influences of the operating temperature and propane flow rate on the fuel cell performances were also discussed.
Titulo: Conversion of propane to propylene in a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell
